## PackageResource class

Resource class to interact with [packages (transactions)](https://community.onespan.com/documentation/onespan-sign/guides/sender-guides/user/transactions)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class PackageResource extends Resource 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [Resource](./onespan-sign-node.resource.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [create(payload)](./onespan-sign-node.packageresource.create.md) |  | Creates a package (transaction). |
|  [delete(packageId)](./onespan-sign-node.packageresource.delete.md) |  | Deletes a package (transaction). |
|  [getAll(params)](./onespan-sign-node.packageresource.getall.md) |  | Retrieves all packages (transactions). |
|  [getAuditTrail(packageId)](./onespan-sign-node.packageresource.getaudittrail.md) |  | Retrieves audit details about a package (transaction). The Audit Trail is embedded directly in the package, and can be viewed any time. |
|  [getEvidenceSummary(packageId)](./onespan-sign-node.packageresource.getevidencesummary.md) |  | Retrieves Evidence Summary information for a specified package (transaction). |
|  [getOne(packageId)](./onespan-sign-node.packageresource.getone.md) |  | Retrieves a single package (transaction). |
|  [update(packageId, payload)](./onespan-sign-node.packageresource.update.md) |  | Updates the information pertaining to a specified package (transaction). |
